thread.title: Lilian Skeete
thread.title_full: Boomers Forever Young reviewed by Lilian Skeete

author: Lilian Skeete
title: Lilian Skeete
text:
Mes amis,
The shipment came in the 3:00 pm mail. That's 8 days altogether from the time you credited my card on the 1st of March. I am pleased!
Lilian
P.S. Would you please correct the spelling of my name? It has ONE L in the middle - L . I . L . I . A . N . Thank you!
